import React from "react"; import {BtnView,BtnSave} from "../Button"; import './style.css'; import API from "../../utils/API"; // import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Book({ title, subtitle, authors, link, description, image, Button }) { if(this.state.isCollapsed){ return(

{title}

Written by: {authors.toString()}

) } return(
{title}

Written by: {authors.toString()}

Category: {categories.toString()}

Publisher: {publisher.toString()}

PublishedDate: {publishedDate}

{this.state.description}

VIEW SAVE
) } export default Book
